extension.description: Imports iPhoto library into Events, Albums, and Ratings categories.
extension.disclaimer: You need to re-import if iPhoto library changes.[CR]Ignore erroneous script error on import.[CR][CR]Only English language is currently supported.[CR]Untested under Windows as of 2010/07/21.[CR]Nightlies as of r32049 might not include script.module.pysqlite (see http://trac.xbmc.org/ticket/9690).
